casebody.data:
Josh FINKELMAN, on Behalf of Himself and the Putative Class Plaintiffs,
v.
NATIONAL FOOTBALL LEAGUE, NFL Ventures, L.P., NFL Properties, L.L.C., NFL Ventures, Inc., NFL Enterprises, L.L.C., Defendants. M-1239 September Term 2017
080501 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 1, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the New Jersey Business and Industry Association for leave to file a brief and argue as amicus curiae is granted. The parties may serve and file briefs in response on or before July 2, 2018. Oral argument is limited to five minutes.
